sentences.sContent: She excelled all other authors of her day.
sentences.sContent_eng: She excelled all other authors of her day.
sentences.sCn: 她超过同时代的所有其他作家。

sentences.sContent: He mixes well with other children in the school.
sentences.sContent_eng: He mixes well with other children in the school.
sentences.sCn: 他在学校里与其他孩子能很好相处。

sentences.sContent: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.sContent_eng: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.sCn: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

phrases.pCn: 所有其他的；每隔一个的
其中；尤其；除了别的之外
在其他条件都相同的情况下

trans.tranOther: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about
